## AsyncTimer.start() method

Starts the timer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
start(timeout: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  timeout | number | The time (in milliseconds) to wait until resolving the promise. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
